Headline: #9 Ashland, #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/74th Place
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland, X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted: due to, street blockage near Ashland/74th Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland, #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 74th, Damen, 76th and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/74th Place.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at  Irving Park
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to a signal problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to a signal problem. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
